ci_support_linux_64_cpptango10.0.yaml:
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cpptango:
- '10.0'
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
target_platform:
- linux-64

name: tango-test

about.description:
This is the Tango-Controls TangoTest device server.
A famous TANGO device server developed for testing.
Tango-Controls is a software toolkit for building control systems.

This is the Tango-Controls TangoTest device server.
A famous TANGO device server developed for testing.
Tango-Controls is a software toolkit for building control systems.

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: tango-test
  version: "3.13"

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://gitlab.com/tango-controls/TangoTest/-/releases/${{ version }}/downloads/TangoTest-with-submodules-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: aea9182f3f8cee3d37c14c36f5f6488df01c34189dbd0e7fda1cfe0b3c3f4194

build:
  number: 1

requirements:
  build:
    - cmake
    - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - if: unix
      then:
        - make
        - pkg-config
  host:
    - cppzmq
    - cpptango
    - omniorb-libs

tests:
  - script:
      - if: win
        then: TangoTest.exe --help 2>&1 | findstr /i usage
        else: TangoTest --help 2>&1 | grep -i usage

about:
  summary: TangoTest device server
  description: |
    This is the Tango-Controls TangoTest device server.
    A famous TANGO device server developed for testing.
    Tango-Controls is a software toolkit for building control systems.
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_file: LICENSE
  homepage: https://www.tango-controls.org
  repository: https://gitlab.com/tango-controls/TangoTest
  documentation: https://tango-controls.readthedocs.io/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - beenje
    - bourtemb

about.description:
This is the Tango-Controls TangoTest device server.
A famous TANGO device server developed for testing.
Tango-Controls is a software toolkit for building control systems.
